title: Cavalier windshield type
content:
I really would like this font that is on the window of this cavalier, Thank you in advance, Trevor

cavalier
Cavalier 001.bmp (152.4 k)
author: isuzu

comments.content:
There may be a font like this. The A and V are very typical... Maybe one of the type guru's knows more.   
Here's the image...   
 ![Cavalier type](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621125913im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69217.gif)
A large corporation like General Motors and a brand name like Chevy, my vote is with Yves (Custom).
Probably some custom designed logo or typeface, but you never know.
